email_content:
Hi Sarah,

Below is the consolidated information you asked for regarding the Q1 marketing campaign, pulled from our latest reporting and Notion workspace:

1. Current performance snapshot (first 4 weeks)
   • Total impressions: 1,254,678
   • Click-through rate (CTR): 3.45%
   • Conversion rate: 2.15%
   • Revenue generated: $78,420
   • Preliminary ROI: positive (exact % in attached sheet – looks promising overall)

2. Audience demographic overview (aggregated firm-wide data)
   • Core age bracket: 30–45 (highest density in 30–34 & 35–44 sub-segments)
   • Average account size: $100k – $500k
   • Primary investment interests: Real-Estate and Tech Start-ups

   Source docs:
   • Marketing Demographics Data → https://www.notion.so/Marketing-Demographics-Data-1f30dc8fa0db8129bc10cb3f3e04465f
   • Q1 Marketing Campaign Strategy → https://www.notion.so/Q1-Marketing-Campaign-Strategy-1f30dc8fa0db81c39a6fdf4a29dd655b

3. Follow-up items flagged by John:
   a. Supply a detailed performance split for the 25-34 vs 35-44 age groups.
   b. Pinpoint under-performing channels so we can reallocate spend/creative.
   c. Clarify whether retention metrics (repeat-purchase %, upsell conversions) are included in the ROI figures and add them if not.

Next steps
• I’m pulling the granular demographic & retention data now and will circulate a slide deck by Thursday morning.
• If Thursday afternoon still works, let’s jump on a call to walk through the findings and lock our Q2 optimisation plan.

Let me know if anything else would be useful in the meantime.

Best,
[Your Name]
